HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Free shipping on orders over 1499 Kč for selected carriers

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Free shipping on orders over 1499 Kč

PARCEL_SHOPS.free_delivery_limit: Free shipping on orders over 1499 Kč for selected carriers

PARCEL_LOCKERS.free_delivery_limit: Free shipping on orders over 1499 Kč for selected carriers

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The e-shop offers home delivery, bulky item delivery, and delivery to parcel shops/lockers. In-store pickup is not available. PROVIDERS: Delivery partners include PPL, Geis, Zásilkovna, and Balíkovna. PRICING: Parcel shop/locker delivery starts from 59 Kč. Standard home delivery starts from 69 Kč. Bulky item delivery is 299 Kč. A cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of 39 Kč applies to all relevant options. FREE SHIPPING: Free shipping is offered on orders over 1499 Kč for selected carriers, and this offer also applies to oversized shipments. NOTABLE FEATURES: The store highlights a large network of over 32,000 pickup points. The free shipping threshold also covers bulky items, which is a significant benefit. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly presented on a dedicated page. Providers and pricing are easy to understand. However, the site lacks specific information on delivery timeframes, express options, and weekend delivery.
